subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Rhonda W
full_text:
--0-1297503422-1208016117=:56355
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Have you had it happen while you were away from the boxes, like going about normal errands around the house or about to fall asleep?
  Rhonda

bruce halliday <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          Rhonda,
 
I have my name mentioned at least 10 times during a normal session, before the big tech mix up mike and lisa would 
adress me by my name constantly, usually one of the first things a new researcher hears is their name being called
I believe our friends do this to give immediate validation to the new box user that they are indeed recieving spirit
communication.
 
Bruce


  Bruce Halliday 




    
---------------------------------
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
From: rhondak1973@...
Date: Fri, 11 Apr 2008 23:42:56 -0700
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

        Hey Mike,
   
  Ive actually heard or thought I heard my name being called a few times...the first time I kinda brushed it off as me being overly tired but Ive had it happen a few times since when I wasnt overly tired.  I havent heard anything else just my name.  Id be curious to know if others had this happen to them too.
   
  Rhonda

Michael Edwards <f1cracker75@...> wrote:
        That is funnny.. Yeah, I am amazed they can see us, and to think even before I got involved in Box EVP, I never thought once that they are right here in the room with us.
   
  Have a question for you. Margaret had mentioned in one of her posts that once we start Box Research, if we never have before, we are more likely to become chairaudient.
   
  Last night, was amazing for me while lying in bed. I heard them talking to me for the first time. It was really neat.
   
  Has this happened to you yet, or even to Kristin since the three of us are relatively new at this?
   
  

Rhonda W <rhondak1973@...> wrote:
        Heard what sounded like "dude whatcha make that from?" and the "carving"
  cool that they can see us...makes me not want to walk around nekkid any more haha
   
  Rhonda
  

EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:
      
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

File : /Mike Edwards Files/What am I holding in my hand Voice said a Carving.mp3 
Uploaded by : f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...> 
Description : I had a wood carved sail boat in my hand, and i asked the spirits what I had in my hand. A voice said a Carving 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Mike%20Edwards%20Files/What%20am%20I%20holding%20in%20my%20hand%20%20%20Voice%20said%20a%20Carving.mp3

Regards,

f1cracker75 <f1cracker75@...>
